Judul: CONSUMER PERCEIVED VALUE ANALYSIS OF INCUMBENT AND NEW BRANDS
Abstrak: Business is competition. Not only for new brand, incumbent brand also involved within competition. According to Tracey & Wiersema, incumbent brand have to implement three disciplines of market leader: operational excellence, customer intimacy and product leadership. It mean every brand should continuously developing. Based on Kotler, new brand should do something different or new when they penetrate market. Both of incumbent brand and new brand have to do innovation to be able conquer the market.
Kata Kunci: Consumer Perceived Value, Innovation, Advertising, Cigarette Industry
